info.description:
This is a spinoff of a story thread I liked in the interactive story "CYOTF(Original)" on Cyoc.net. Here are the links:

For the first chapter of the main story "CYOTF(Original)" on Cyoc.net: http://www.cyoc.net/stories/stories_cache/story_31.html


For the story thread this story was inspired by: http://www.cyoc.net/stories/stories_cache/chapter_19598.html


Basically, you enter a magic shop and discover a flashlight that can give off either blue or pink light. Blue light makes the body part you're pointing at more masculine, and pink light makes it more feminine. There is also a knob on the side of the flashlight that either increases the intensity or decreases the intensity of the light, so you have more variability in what you can do. Strewn around the shop are other magical(and also high tech devices bought from the future) items that may also be of interest to you. Enjoy!
